SELECT pg.PagoID, pg.Valor_Pago, pg.Fecha_Registro, pg.Fecha_Pago, pg.Estado, pg.Comprobante_Pago,
p1.DocumentoID as Egre_DocumentoID, p1.Telefono as Egre_Telefono, p1.Celular as Egre_Celuar, p1.TipoDocumentoID as Egre_TipoDocumentoID, p1.Nombre as Egre_Nombre, p1.Apellido as Egre_Apellido, p1.Direccion as Egre_Direccion, p1.Correo_Personal as Egre_Correo_Personal, p1.Genero as Egre_Genero, Egresado.Semestre_Graduacion as Egre_Semestre_Graduacion, Egresado.Correo_Estudiantil as Egre_Correo_Estudiantil, Egresado.Cargo as Egre_Cargo, Egresado.Labora as Egre_Labora,
Egresado_Empresa.Nombre as Egre_Epre_Nombre, Egresado_Empresa.Telefono as Egre_Epre_Telefono, Egresado_Empresa.Direccion as Egre_Epre_Direccion,
FROM Persona as p1 INNER JOIN Pago_Cuota as pg ON(p1.DocumentoID = pg.DocumentoID) LEFT JOIN Egresado ON (Egresado.DocumentoID= p1.DocumentoID) LEFT JOIN Egresado_Empresa ON (Egresado.Empresa = Egresado_Empresa.Nombre) ORDER BY ASC pg.Fecha_Registro
